title: 5-year-old shot in Jeff-Vander-Lou neighborhood
content:
ST. LOUIS • A 5-year-old boy was injured in a shooting Sunday in the city's Jeff-Vander-Lou neighborhood north of Grand Center.
Police released few details but said that the child was transported to a hospital and listed as stable after he was injured in the 2500 block of North Grand Boulevard.
The shooting happened at 12:49 p.m.
Please check back to STLtoday.com for more details on this breaking news story.
